name: genital
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
connected with the outer sexual organs, especially the penis or vulva: the genital area/organs Herpes simplex is the virus responsible for cold sores on the lips and face, and is also involved in genital infection. See
genitals
More examplesFewer examplesThe pain is centered mainly in the genital region.Probiotics may protect against infections in the genital and urinary tracts.The virus sometimes causes annoying but typically painless genital warts.
